articles.title: Skyrim grandma Shirley Curry is out as a mod for PC, Xbox One - Polygon
articles.description: Shirley Curry, know to some as “Gamer Grandma” has been modded into Skyrim and the mod is live on Nexus Mods for Windows PC and Xbox One. You can now play the classic RPG from Bethesda alongside her as she supports you as an NPC follower.
